resources.string: The sun will not go above %1$.1f° in the foreseeable future, setting %2$.1f° will always yield the same results.
The sun will not go below %1$.1f° in the foreseeable future, setting %2$.1f° will always yield the same results.
The widget will show the current angle and the time range when the sun is %1$s %2$.0f°.

What's that degree (°)? 
Altitude angle. The widget shows the current position of the sun which is the angle between the horizon and the sun.


Threshold 
You can set a threshold for the sun's position. The threshold will show the time range when the sun's altitude angle is above/below the threshold. The time range will be bold when the sun is in the right position. The start/end time of the range will be red up to 30 minutes before the sun enters/leaves the specified range. 
For example: if the threshold is above 0° this is good for a soft alert before sunrise/sunset.


Hide parts of the widget 
Open the options menu to do so. You can show/hide the part of the day and last update time displays in case your phone's current launcher doesn't give enough space for the widget.
